data.eml:eml: A new genus and species of Edessinae from Amazon Region (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Pentatomidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Fernandes, José Antônio Marin (2010): A new genus and species of Edessinae from Amazon Region (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Pentatomidae). Zootaxa 2662: 53-65, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.199043
